title: ExternalUnitOfMeasure
description: A unit of measure description belonging to an external system, which is intended to be mapped or related to a platform-standard UnitOfMeasure record. Mappings can be exact or not. This is expressed by he MapStatus. MapStatus:identical means that the external unit reference can be swapped out by the platform standard reference. MapStatus:corrected indicates same concept but differences in the conversion parameters. Data must be treated or re-labeled; the decision can only be taken on a case by case basis. Finally  MapStatus:unsupported means that there is no equivalent platform standard reference. An ExternalUnitOfMeasure record can be seen as an 'alias' for the UnitOfMeasureID it refers to. Adding NameAliases to UnitOfMeasure is, however, not recommended because local overrides may be lost when new OSDU updates are shipped.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

NamespaceID.title: Catalog Namespace ID
NamespaceID.description: A namespace reference grouping a list of records with the goal of providing unique look-ups by Name/Code. It is strongly recommended to make the NamespaceID's code part of the system property id.

MapStateID.title: Map State ID
MapStateID.description: The mapping status declaring whether the mapping is straight forward, direct (identical) or whether special treatment is required (corrected). Items, which are known not to be mappable are declared as unsupported. In the latter case the UnitOfMeasureID is not expected to be populated.

CorrectToExternalUnitOfMeasureID.title: Correct to External Unit of Measure ID
CorrectToExternalUnitOfMeasureID.description: For CatalogMapStateType:Corrected or CatalogMapStateType:Convert, use a conversion to this intermediate unit before swapping the reference to the platform standard UnitOfMeasure. Absent for other map states.

UnitOfMeasureID.title: Unit of Measure ID
UnitOfMeasureID.description: The platform standard UnitOfMeasure record, to which this ExternalUnitOfMeasure record is mapped. This record may be understood as an alias to the standard UnitOfMeasure.

ExternalUnitQuantityID.title: External Unit Quantity ID
ExternalUnitQuantityID.description: The External Unit Quantity is a semantic description of the quantity this ExternalUnitOfMeasure is describing ('Length' for instance).

UnitQuantityID.title: Unit Quantity ID
UnitQuantityID.description: De-normalized, mapped platform standard UnitQuantity, is the ExternalUnitQuantity was indeed mappable.

UnitDimensionCode.title: Unit Dimension Code
UnitDimensionCode.description: The dimensionality using the symbols for dimension as defined in https://www.bipm.org/utils/common/documents/jcgm/JCGM_200_2012.pdf, i.e. L for length, M for mass, T for time, I for electric current, N for amount of substance, J for luminous intensity; except Θ for thermodynamic temperature, which is replaced by the symbol K, the additional symbol D for temperature difference and the additional symbol 0 for no dimension.

IsBaseUnit.title: Base Unit Flag
IsBaseUnit.description: True if the unit is a base unit for the unit quantity. If the property is absent, it means the unit is not a base unit.

UnitDimensionName.title: Unit Dimension Name
UnitDimensionName.description: The name of the unit dimension concept.

PersistableReference.title: Persistable Reference
PersistableReference.description: The self-contained, stringified JSON reference for the unit. This value can be attached to data values and data records and carry the unit reference independent of a UnitOfMeasure instance.
